title: Display Property 'none' Not Working in New PDF Emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not hide the item as expected in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should be hidden in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new PDF emitter and observe that the label is not hidden as expected.
